chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (t : Term) (v : nat) (s : Term), LNT2LNN_term (substituteTerm LNT t v s) = substituteTerm LNN (LNT2LNN_term t) v (LNT2LNN_term s)

Premises:
LNT2LNN_term = fix LNT2LNN_term (t : Term) : fol.Term LNN := match t with | @fol.var _ v => fol.var LNN v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNN f (LNT2LNN_terms (arity LNT (inr f)) ts) end with LNT2LNN_terms (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) {struct ts} : fol.Terms LNN n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms LNN n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNN | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNN m (LNT2LNN_term s) (LNT2LNN_terms m ss) end for LNT2LNN_term : Term -> fol.Term LNN
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
substituteTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Term L
LNN2LNT_subTerm : forall (t : fol.Term LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), LNN2LNT_term (substituteTerm LNN t v s) = substituteTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) v (LNN2LNT_term s)
freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
LNT2LNT_term : forall t : Term, LNN2LNT_term (LNT2LNN_term t) = t
subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
subSubAllTerm : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (subAllTerm L t m) v s = subAllTerm L t (fun n : nat => substituteTerm L (m n) v s)
LNN2LNT_subTerms : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), LNN2LNT_terms n (substituteTerms LNN n ts v s) = substituteTerms LNT n (LNN2LNT_terms n ts) v (LNN2LNT_term s)
subFormulaEqual : forall (L : Language) (t1 t2 : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.equal L t1 t2) v s = fol.equal L (substituteTerm L t1 v s) (substituteTerm L t2 v s)
freeVarSubTerm3 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerm L t)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t)
freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
subFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.impH L f1 f2) v s = fol.impH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
subTermId : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat), substituteTerm L t v (fol.var L v) = t
LNN.forallE : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula) (v : nat) (t : LNN.Term), LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.forallH v f) -> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
subTermFunction : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (apply L f ts) v s = apply L f (substituteTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts v s)
subFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.notH L f) v s = fol.notH L (substituteFormula L f v s)
subFormulaDepth : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), depth L (substituteFormula L f v s) = depth L f
subSubAllTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerms L n (subAllTerms L n ts m) v s = subAllTerms L n ts (fun n0 : nat => substituteTerm L (m n0) v s)
subSubAllFormula : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (subAllFormula L f m) v s) (subAllFormula L f (fun n : nat => substituteTerm L (m n) v s)))
subTermVar1 : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (fol.var L v) v s = s
subTermTrans : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerm L t)) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerm L t v1 s
subWithEqualsTerm : forall (L : Language) (a b t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L (substituteTerm L t v a) (substituteTerm L t v b))
subTermVar2 : forall (L : Language) (v x : nat) (s : fol.Term L), v <> x -> substituteTerm L (fol.var L x) v s = fol.var L x
LNN2LNT_subFormula : forall (T : System) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), SysPrf T (iffH (LNN2LNT_formula (substituteFormula LNN f v s)) (substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f) v (LNN2LNT_term s)))
subSubTerm : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
LNT2LNN_formula = fix LNT2LNN_formula (f : Formula) : fol.Formula LNN := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => fol.equal LNN (LNT2LNN_term t1) (LNT2LNN_term t2) | @atomic _ r _ => match r return (fol.Formula LNN) with end | @fol.impH _ A B => fol.impH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) (LNT2LNN_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => fol.notH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => fol.forallH LNN v (LNT2LNN_formula A) end : Formula -> fol.Formula LNN
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (atomic L r ts) v s = atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
LNN2LNT_freeVarTerm : forall t : fol.Term LNN, freeVarTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) = freeVarTerm LNN t
reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
folLogic.existI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
folLogic.forallE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)
subTermExch : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v2 s2) v1 s1
LNN2LNT_exist : forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula LNN), LNN2LNT_formula (fol.existH LNN v a) = existH v (LNN2LNT_formula a)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) < -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula2 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f))
subFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s) else fol.forallH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term

```coq
intros t v s.
induction t.
- simpl. rewrite LNT2LNN_term. rewrite LNT2LNN_term. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite LNN2LNT_subTerm. rewrite IHt. reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros t v s. induction t. - simpl. rewrite LNT2LNN_term. rewrite LNT2LNN_term. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite LNN2LNT_subTerm. rewrite IHt. reflexivity.
